official_title: A bill to establish a Bureau of Motor Carrier Safety within the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes the Bureau of Motor Carrier Safety within the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration. States that such Bureau shall be headed by an Associate Administrator for Motor Carrier Safety. Delineates the functions of such Associate Administrator, including implementing the duties and powers of the Secretary of Transportation in such areas as: (1) hazardous materials transportation; (2) noise control; and (3) motor carrier and bus regulations.

titles.title: A bill to establish a Bureau of Motor Carrier Safety within the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, and for other purposes.
